name: Jumpy Witch
description:
Beautiful graphics and sound, and unique jump style.
Here comes a game for you jump experts!

### Game Features
▶ Beautiful sound tracks.
▶ High thrill and excitement delivered with minimum controls.
▶ Enjoy the beautiful flight of the witch with "Touch & Hold" controls.
▶ Boast your score to your friends on Game Center.
▶ The die is cast. No turning back.

※ We support Game Center.

High thrill Platfomer / Indie / jumpy game.
